description: From Latin evanescere (“to vanish”). Doublet of vanish.

verbs.description: evanesce (third-person singular simple present evanesces, present participle evanescing, simple past and past participle evanesced)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To disappear into a mist or dissipate in vapor
(intransitive, chemistry) To transition from the solid state to gaseous state without ever becoming a liquid
